name: Chained Horror Experiences
description:
Three female college students who belong to the occult circle of Shimokawa University,
which is located a little far from the city, heard a rumor and came to an abandoned hospital
deep in the mountains.
The abandoned hospital has been the place where mysterious burnt corpses have been found many times,
and the three of them came to the abandoned hospital to test their courage.
However, this action was the beginning of all horror experiences to come...

This is a point-and-click horror game set in modern Japan.
The story is a fictional mix of ghosts and occult elements.
This game uses only the mouse, not the keyboard.
(You can see the operation manual from the title screen of the game, so please read it
carefully before playing.)

・ Survive With Everyone Without Missing Anyone!

The horror experience will chain to everyone on the spot.No one is an exception.
It's up to you to stop this chain...

・collect Documents and Solve All the Mysteries!

To unravel the story in its entirety, you must piece together all the horror experiences...
Collect clues and find out "what ghosts are" and "why they attack you".

・Beware of item placement that changes every time you play!
All items on the stage are randomly placed...
You must explore the map carefully and escape while you have life.

～notes～

This game contains depictions of characters dying.
Please note that some content is not suitable for all ages.
